sentences.en: The lead plaintiff of the lawsuit is the University of California.
sentences.cn: 这次诉讼的第一原告是加利福尼亚大学。

sentences.en: The defendant may also file a counterclaim against the plaintiff, a cross-claim against any co-defendant or an impleader.
sentences.cn: 被告也可以对原告提出反诉，对共同被告或原告提出交叉诉讼。

sentences.en: Mr. A was counsel for the plaintiff, and Mr. B for the defendant.
sentences.cn: A先生作原告的辩护人， B先生作被告的辩护人。
